title: Group therapy advantage over individual therapy

content.question: An advantage of group therapy over individual therapy is that group therapy

choices.label: requires less commitment from the client
produces a significantly higher recovery rate
produces a higher rate of spontaneous remission
enables clients to realize that their problems are not unique

content.answer: enables clients to realize that their problems are not unique

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
